title: Help!  cant reinstall league
body:
today i try to reinstall league because i can't  update my patch(I used all the methods I can do). but if i try to install i cant reach the site.( the site wont respond)i already delete all the files{{item:3070}} 
please help! {{item:3070}}

replies.body: There could be a firewall, anti-virus, or setting on your OS blocking you from connecting to the patching server.  Use the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot and restore communication.  You can also download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to help with some steps, like configuring your firewall settings.  Hope that helps!

still cant reach the site{{item:3073}} 
and in hextech repair tool it always ask me the launcher.exe file.but i already delete them all.
